moreApps.apps1Desc: This application allows you to enable/disable ads or recommendations for various apps in Xiaomi (MIUI) devices.
moreApps.apps2Desc: PiGo - Explore Your Pi Servers On the Go
moreApps.apps3Desc: `OHM-Client` is an unofficial open hardware monitor client app for android and iOS written in react-native. Using this app you can monitor open hardware monitor web server.
moreApps.apps4Desc: An interactive way to learn Gujarati kakko, barakhadi and numbers.

aboutScreen.title: About MIUIAdsHelper
aboutScreen.infoDescTitle: This application allows you to enable/disable ads or recommendations for various apps in Xiaomi (MIUI) devices.
aboutScreen.telegramSubTitle: Discussion about bugs, improvements, feature request and development news
aboutScreen.githubSubTitle: Developer profile and list of open sourced projects

home.app_support: You can support my work by purchasing a dark theme to help me continue developing this app.

ads_step_0_detail: Mi Music Player is the MIUI native music player which is designed just for Mi Fans. With Mi Music, playing local songs will be much easier.
ads_step_0_steps:
1. Open the **Mi Music** app.
2. Go to Music app **Settings**.
3. Tap on **Advanced Settings**.
4. Turn off Recommendations.
ads_step_0_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_1_detail: Mi Video Player is the MIUI native video player which is designed just for Mi Fans. With Mi Video, playing local videos will be much easier.
ads_step_1_steps:
1. Open the **MI Video** app.
2. In **Account** tab Tap on **Settings**
3. Turn off Recommendations.
ads_step_2_detail: Themes app is the MIUI native theming app which is designed just for Mi Fans.
ads_step_2_steps:
1. Open the **Theme** app.
2. In **last tab** Tap on **Settings**
3. Turn off Recommendations.
ads_step_2_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_3_detail: Mi File Manager is a free, secure tool that helps you find file faster, manage files easily, and share them offline with others
ads_step_3_steps:
1. Open **Mi File Manager** app.
2. Tap on **three horizontal lines** at the **top corner** of Mi File Explorer.
3. Go to **Settings and About**.
4. Turn off Recommendations.
ads_step_3_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_4_detail: Mi Browser is an app from the category browsing, whose license is free which is available in english
ads_step_4_steps:
1. Open **Mi Browser**.
2. Open MIUI Browser **Settings**.
3. Go to **Advanced** > **Top sites order**. If Top sites order option is missing, then look ever option until you find the **recommendations option**.
4. Turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_5_detail: Mi Downloads app is the MIUI native downloader which is designed just for Mi Fans.
ads_step_5_steps:
1. Open **Downloads** app.
2. Tap on **three dots** at the **top corner**.
3. Go to **Settings**.
4. Turn off Show recommended content.
ads_step_5_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_6_detail: Mi Security app is default security app which is designed for Mi fans.
ads_step_6_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** App.
2. Tap on **Settings** Gear Icon in the **top corner**.
3. Under **Recommendations** turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_6_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_7_detail: Mi Security app is part of Mi security app which is designed for Mi fans.
ads_step_7_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2. Tap on the **Settings** icon in the **top corner**.
3. Tap on **Cleaner** under **Feature Settings**.
4. Turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_7_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_8_detail: App Lock protects your app with a password or fingerprint.
ads_step_8_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2.Tap on the **App Lock**.
3. Tap on the **Settings icon** in the **top corner**.
3. Turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_8_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_9_detail: Boost Speed App is part of Mi security aap which is designed to clean memory cache.
ads_step_9_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2.Tap on the **Boost speed**.
3. Tap on the **Settings icon** in the **top corner**.
4. Turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_9_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_10_detail: Manage Apps App is part of Mi security aap which is designed to uninstall apps.
ads_step_10_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2.Tap on the **Manage apps**.
3. Tap on the **three dots** and then **tap on Settings** icon in the **top corner**.
4. Turn off Receive recommendations.
ads_step_10_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_11_detail: MiuiDeamon is spyware fron Xiaomi. It collects a lot of your data and sends it to Xiaomi servers. MSA is Xiaomi advertising app that shows ad notifications and is a security risk aswell
ads_step_11_steps:
1.Go to **System Settings**
2. Go to **Additional settings** or **Password & Security**
3. Authorization and revocation 
4. Tap on **MSA and MiuiDeamon**
5. Revoke authorization
ads_step_11_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_12_detail: When the recommendations are off, you'll still see the same quality of ads as when its on, but they wont be basen on your behaviour data or your personal information.
ads_step_12_steps:
1. Open **System Settings** app.
2. Go to **Additional Settings** > **Privacy** > **Ad services**.
3. Turn off Personalized Ad Recommendation.
ads_step_13_detail: Disable Promoted apps toggle. This has to be done to every folder.
ads_step_13_steps:
1. Tap on the **folder** in which you want to disable ads/Promoted apps.
2. Tap on **Folder Name**.
3. Disable Promoted apps **toggle**. This has to be done to every folder on MIUI.
ads_step_13_specialNote:
Only applicable to MIUI default launcher.
You have to manually find your folder.
ads_step_14_detail: Disable suggestions from Homescreen & Recents menu.
ads_step_14_steps:
1. Open **System Setting**
2. Navigate to **Home screen & Recent**
3. Turn off Show suggestions.
ads_step_15_subtitle: Disable usage & diagnostics, advertising id and personalization.
ads_step_15_detail: Reset or disable advertising id, disable debug logging for ads and disable usage & diagnostics
ads_step_15_steps:
1. Open **System Setting**
2. Navigate to **Google**
3. Choose Appropriate option.
ads_step_16_detail: Personalized Ad Recommendation would allow the operating system to analyze your phone usage and behavior thus throwing ads and pop-up recommendations based on what you’ve searched for in the past or by how you use your Xiaomi Smartphone.
ads_step_16_steps:
1. Open **System Setting**
2. Navigate to **Password & security**
3. Tap on **Privacy**
ads_step_17_detail: All the ads that appear based on the recommendation of the lock screen can be disabled by following two simple steps.
ads_step_17_steps:
1. Open **System Setting**
2. Navigate to **Always-on display & Lock screen**
3. Tap on **Glance for Mi**
4. Tap on **Privacy Policy**
5. Turn off Recommended for you.
ads_step_17_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_18_detail: All the ads that appear on the app vault can be disabled by following two simple steps.
ads_step_18_steps:
1. Navigate to **App vault** (-1 Screen)
2. Tap on **setting** icon 
3. Tap on **Glance for Mi**
4. Tap on **About App** vault
5. Turn off Personalized services.
ads_step_19_detail: All the ads that appear on the ShareMe app can be disabled by following two simple steps.
ads_step_19_steps:
1. Navigate to **ShareMe** app
2. Tap on the **More** icon(top right) 
3. Tap on the **About** button menu
4. Tap on the **Help & Feedback** button
5. Turn off Personalized ads.
ads_step_19_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_20_detail: All the content that appear based on the recommendations that can be disabled by following two simple steps.
ads_step_21_detail: WhatsApp Cleaner is part of Mi security app which is designed for Mi fans.
ads_step_21_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2. Tap on the **WhatsApp cleaner**.
3. Tap on the **Settings** icon in the top right corner.
4. Turn off Recommendations.
ads_step_21_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_22_detail: Game Turbo is part of Mi security app which is designed for Mi fans.
ads_step_22_steps:
1. Open **Mi Security** app.
2. Tap on the **Game Turbo**.
3. Tap on the **Settings** icon in the **top right** corner.
4. In general settings turn off Content Recommendations.
ads_step_22_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
ads_step_23_detail: Mi Store helps you to discover Mi and Redmi mobiles, accessories, ecosystem products and many more.
ads_step_23_steps:
1. Open **Mi Store** app.
2. Tap on **Account** tab
3. Tap on the **Settings** icon in the **top right** corner.
4. Tap on **Notification Preferences**
5. Turn off Personalized Recommendations.
ads_step_23_specialNote: You have to manually find ads setting.
iap_desc: To unlock more options you need to make a purchase. Simply choose one of the available purchase options to proceed. If you would like a free coupon, please contact me and I will provide one.
iap_item_1_desc: Buy me a cup of tea
ads_detail_app_not_available: Probably this application is not installed on your phone!
